Name: Emerenciana
description:
Emerenciana work as agriculture, and she mainly grow water spinach on her farm. After the vegetables grown, she will harvest and bring them to market to sell. She has been planting water spinach for many years now with her own working capital.

She is requesting a loan of $1000 trough KIF to help her improve her business. Every day, she is doing her activities by planting and looking after her vegetables because she makes a living from it and earning a good income for her loving family. She plans to use this loan to buy more manure, other vegetable seeds and some new farming equipment in order to increase the amount of vegetables in the next harvest.
